Clk gating enable

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x9c
Size:
0x4

Description

Control register to enable clk gating. Default is 0 (disabled).
Caliptra Access: RO
SOC Access: RW

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] clk_gating_en rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

clk_gating_en

Clk gating enable
